name: Psionic Technology & Consciousness Interfaces
description: Examining the integration of technology with consciousness to enhance psionic abilities and energy control.

cards.title: Psionic Devices & Amplifiers
cards.description: Exploring tools designed to enhance and direct psionic energy.
bulletpoints: Learn about ancient and modern devices such as orgone accumulators and radionics machines.
Understand how crystal matrices and geometric structures influence energy flow.
Experiment with wearable psionic tech to augment sensory perception.

cards.title: Neural-Link Technology & Psi Augmentation
cards.description: Investigating the potential of neural-linked implants and consciousness-augmenting technologies.
bulletpoints: Study the effects of external electromagnetic fields on psionic potential.
Explore prototype neuro-implants designed to enhance cognition and extrasensory perception.
Analyze ethical considerations of human-machine integration for psionic applications.

cards.title: Psionic AI & Consciousness Synergy
cards.description: Understanding the relationship between artificial intelligence and psionic abilities.
bulletpoints: Investigate theories on AI-driven consciousness expansion.
Explore how AI-assisted meditation and biofeedback can enhance psi abilities.
Develop protocols for merging psionic intent with AI-guided energy amplification.
